item.title: Fix Linux EFI
item.description: When you have many disks, and you install many operating system, you may faced with a problem. That is your system’s EFI file will be stored in a different disk rather than your root disk. Also, you may accidentally delete system’s EFI file in a different disk. Here is how you can fix it. Warning This article is not a step-by-step guide! All the commands in this article are very dangerous.
